General.Name: Solaria Energia y Medio Ambiente S.A.
General.Description: Solaria Energía y Medio Ambiente, S.A., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the generation of solar photovoltaic energy. It owns, manages, and operates a pipeline of approximately 14,200 MW of photovoltaic plants in Spain, Italy, Portugal, Uruguay, and Greece. The company was incorporated in 2002 and is based in Madrid, Spain.

1.Name: Mr. Jose Arturo  Diaz-Tejeiro Larranaga
1.Title: First VP of the Board of Directors
